channel.title: NPC Resizing
channel.description: Hello. Is there a way to resize an npc? For example, I want to make General Graador smaller. How can I do that? I cannot find his model id in entitydef.java so idk what to do. Please help? Thanks. :)

item.title: NPC Resizing
item.dc:creator: @Doing_Cho21 Doing Cho2
item.description:
@Doing_Cho21 wrote:

Hello. Is there a way to resize an npc? For example, I want to make General Graador smaller. How can I do that? I cannot find his model id in entitydef.java so idk what to do. Please help?
Thanks.
